      • totalPriceWorkHomecenter

        public static int totalPriceWorkHomecenter(java.lang.String location,
                                           int numMaterials,
                                           int[] priceHomecenter,
                                           int[] amountMaterials)
        Method to find the total value to be a paid in Homecenter.
        pre: Must be initialized the methods called like as "registerLocation", "gaveNumsMateriasl"
        "gaveNameMaterials", "gaveAmountMaterials", "gaveUtilMaterials"
        post: Finding the cost of products if you buy in Homecenter.
        Parameters:
        location - ask for the location. location != "" and (location = Norte || location = Sur || location = Centro).
        numMaterials - amount of the products. numMaterials != numMaterials lesser than 0 and the method gaveNumsMateriasl must be initialize.
        amountMaterials - amount of the number of the products. amountMaterials != amountMaterials lesser than 0.
        priceHomecenter - cost of the product on Homecenter. priceHomecenter != priceHomecenter lesser than 0.
        Returns:
        priceHomecenterTotal

        post: Finding the best place to buy the product.
        Parameters:
        numMaterials - amount of the products. numMaterials != numMaterials lesser than 0 and the method gaveNumsMateriasl must be initialize.

        priceFerreteriaCentro - value of the product in Ferreteria del Centro. priceFerreteriaCentro != lesser than 0.

      • bestPay

        public static int bestPay(int numMaterials,
                          int[] bestPrice,
                          java.lang.String location)
        Method to find the payment value with the best prices. pre: Must be initialized the methods called like as "gaveNumsMateriasl", "metBestPlace"
        "metBestPrice"
        post: Finding the best value to pay.
        Parameters:
        numMaterials - amount of the products. numMaterials != numMaterials lesser than 0 and the method gaveNumsMateriasl must be initialize.
        bestPrice - best price of the products. bestPrice != "" || bestPrice != null and bestprice != bestprice lesser than 0
        location - ask for the location. location != "" and (location = Norte || location = Sur || location = Centro).
        Returns:
        pricePay

        nameMaterials - name of the product for the work. nameMaterials != null || nameMaterials != "".
        Returns:
        blackWorkMaterials
